name: Purple Deathmatch
description: They say that death has its own death, is it? Somewhere in the western province, after the pension reform ...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 60 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
